comments:
Concerning about 
    TasksWizardFragment
in 
    package org.eclipse.wst.server.ui.internal.wizard.fragment

The method TasksWizardFragment.isSelected() is called frequently (10 times per
expanding a node in the server view).


The code test try to test a boolean value bind to a map. However, it relies on a
call all try block to handle that the boolean may not exist. 


I see no reason that we can't do better.
